roleset.name: Natural Disaster: earthquake

example.name: arg 2
example.text: Strike-slip faults tend to be oriented near vertically, resulting in an approximate width of 10 km within the brittle crust,[7] thus earthquakes with magnitudes much larger than 8 are not possible.

roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor.

example.name: arg1- plate mentioned
example.text: Southwestern British Columbiaâ€™s largest recorded earthquake is an example of a North American Plate earthquake.
